name: BotPing
author: Kuro
install_msg:
Thank you for installing BotPing.
Note that this replaces the `ping` command with an embedded one, users won't be able to run the command if the bot doesn't have embed links permission.
This cog has docs! Check it out at <https://kuro-cogs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/cogs/botping.html>.
description: Creates a custom ping embed to display latency statistics.
short: Creates a custom ping embed to display latency statistics.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any end user data.
